Deficiency Narrative: A physical altercation occurred between two children was not documented.
Correction Narrative: Email received from the operation providing documentation of staff that were retrained, their certificates, and the assessments for the employees with multiple investigations,

Deficiency Narrative: During a short personal restraint a child received carpet burn to his face and his elbow. The child was taken to the doctor due to injuries sustained.
Correction Narrative: The operation emailed their compliance information stating the staff involved in the investigation was retrained on SAMA before he could work his next shift and he was placed on a safety plan. All staff were verbally reminded to minimize the risk of harm in a containment. On 07/18/2023 a in person follow-up was completed as part of inspection #3958439.  The operation stated that the staff is still on a safety plan and before the end of July they will determine what the next steps will be for staff, such as continued ongoing training with a new program they are starting.  They will discuss if staff's role should be monitoring EBIs instead of conducting them.
